wikipedia_page.main: Roland James Hamilton, known as Steve Hamilton (24 February 1950 – 1 August 2009) was a Scottish broadcaster. He was best known for DJing and presenting on Radio Forth and announcing on Wheel of Fortune.

response: Steve Hamilton (1935–1997) was an American professional baseball and basketball player.
